import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; class Form_of_list extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ title:"", Description:"", Priority:"" } this.ChangeHandler=this.ChangeHandler.bind(this) } ChangeHandler(e){ const {name,value}=e.target; this.setState({[name]:value}) } componentDidMount(){ axios .post('http://127.0.0.1:3000/api/v1/lists/create/:userId/:authToken') } render(){ return(
ToDo List
ViewLists (current) CreateLists Logout

Create List

{this.state.title}{this.state.Description}

) } } export default Form_of_list
